name: Notion Crypto Tracker
description: The Crypto & NFT Tracker Notion template is perfect for anyone looking to keep track of their cryptocurrency and NFT investments. The template includes real-time asset prices, making it easy to monitor your portfolio's value and stay up-to-date on market trends.The template is designed with simplicity in mind, featuring a clean and intuitive interface that is easy to navigate. You can easily customize the template to fit your specific needs, adding or removing sections as needed.The real-tim
features: Live asset prices; Crypto purchase tracker; Crypto portfolio tracker; NFT tracker; Key metrics such as current portfolio value, total earnings & growth rate
